All were of the typical human RVA genotype I1 and therefore there is The high genetic divergence and partial relatedness of most of the segments of the different 3 4 3 bat RVA strains and the ones identified in this study indicate the frequent occurrence of 3 4 4 reassortment events in the general bat population and those of Cameroon in particular. Also, current knowledge of the genetic diversity, there seems to exist several true bat RVA
